ProductInfo.Features:
Pre-installed 1TB SATA hard drive for the DVR. Remote View via 3G Phone - Windows Mobile and Symbian. Email Alert and Daylight Savings Time. Network remote users up to 10 simultaneously.
Video Input: BNC 8-Channel Inputs. Video Output: BNC x 2 and VGA. Audio: RCA Inputs and Output. Display Resolution NTSC: 720 x 480. Display Resolution PAL: 720 x 576.
Display Frame Rate NTSC: 240 fps. Display Frame Rate PAL: 200 fps. NTSC Record Resolution: 720 x 240 / 360 x 240. PAL Record Resolution: 720 x 288 / 360 x 288. NTSC Record Frame Rate: 240 fps. PAL Record Frame Rate: 200 fps. Record Modes: Continuous, Motion Detection, Sensor Triggered, Time Schedule.
Camera Dimensions: 5.8" (L) x 2.5" (W) x 2" (H). Camera weight: 0.6 LB. Camera Image Sensor: PixelPlus. 24 IR LEDs. 3.6mm Fixed Lens. Resolution: 600TVL. Distance: 50 ft. Power: DC 12V. Silver color, aluminum housing. Weather-resistant & vandal-proof. Ceiling mount/wall mount.
Package Contents: 8-Channel DVR (with 1TB HDD), IR cameras X 8, User Manual, Software CD, Camera Cables x 8 (60 ft), Power Supply for DVR, 8-way Splitter Cable, Cameras Stands x 8, Remote Control, Mouse.
ProductInfo.Name: R-Tech 8 Channel H.264 DVR with 1TB HDD and 8 High Resolution 600 TVL 24 LEDs Night Vision Indoor/Outdoor Security Cameras
